item.title: Trump Picks Brendan Carr to Lead F.C.C.
item.description: Mr. Carr, who currently sits on the commission and is a vocal critic of Big Tech, has said the agency should regulate the tech industry.

item.title: What Are ATACMS, the U.S. Missiles That May Be Used Against Russia?
item.description: In a major policy shift, the Biden administration has authorized Ukraine to use the ballistic missiles within Russia.

item.title: After Flurry of Cabinet Picks, Trump Rethinks Candidates for Treasury Secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald J. Trump is expected to invite the contenders for the role, including Kevin Warsh and Marc Rowan, to Mar-a-Lago this week.

item.title: Biden Allows Ukraine to Strike Russia With Long-Range U.S. Missiles
